column5: Heading to Cuba, looking for info on tackle for barracuda and other fish from shore thanks
Jerkbaits hard and soft will catch you lots of cuda. I have had good luck with xraps and zoom flukes. Cheers jeff
10 wt and matching large arbour fly reel

Casting spoons. rattle traps and 40 lb braid if you are surfcasting for other than reef fish. I learned this from fishing other areas than Cuba it seems My government does not play well with Cuba a long time ago....sigh.   Art
My particular favourite for them were topwater lures, poppers in particular. Just make sure you have a wire trace onâ€¦their teeth are sharper than razors.
what i use are big, plugs or cranks on my mh bait caster with a large bass reel with 80lb braid, never lost a cuds and also managed quite a few other interesting saltwater fish
Thanks for all the great info
